item.title: 317 Drops
item.dc:creator: @dianhua383 dianhua383
item.description:
@dianhua383 wrote:

I need help understanding and how to make this happen. Im trying to make it so my drop rate percentage is higher with a ring or player rights. I looked at it, and tried to add this into my dropTable.java

private static double boostChance(Player player) { if
(player.playerEquipment[Player.playerRing] == 4202) { return 0.00015; }
if (player.isDonator) { return 0.00013; }
if(player.playerEquipment[Player.playerRing] == 6465) { return 0.8; }
player.sendMessage("<shad=000000><col=00E600>Your Chances Increasedâ€¦");
if(player.gameMode == 2) { return 0.2; }
return 0.0; }

Though im guessing the return is the drop rate percentage, or if im wrong correct me. But ive added this into my player.java and still I dont see a difference ingame.
nor does it say my drops have been increased with my sendmessage. Any help?

Read full topic
